mapper.select: select hot.id, kid.name, mis.title, mis.description, mis.level, rep.media, rep.score, rep.comment, exists(select 1 from kid_reply_hot_like lik where lik.hot_id = hot.id and kid_id = #{id}) from kid_to_mission ktm join kid_reply_hot hot on hot.reply_id = ktm.reply_id join kid on kid.id = ktm.kid_id join kid_mission mis on mis.id = ktm.mission_id join kid_reply rep on rep.id = ktm.reply_id
select com.content, kid.name, kid.photo, com.time from kid_reply_hot_comment com join kid on com.kid_id = kid.id where com.hot_id = #{hotId}
